name: Cluckbait
description:
You are a rookie social media influencer trying to expand your online presence and following. You are also a chicken who has a smartphone with limited storage space.

Wisely fill your storage space with egg-sthetic posts, social media presence, and contacts; after all, being a good influencer is knowing how to balance all three! Fame doesn't come cheep.

Do you have what it takes to be at the top of the pecking order?

Tools
  • Unity
    • iTween
  • FMOD
  • Photoshop
  • Reaper
Team
  • Del Nordlund
  • Carson Mackie
